name: @sixty-sales/sales-dashboard-mcp
description: Sales Dashboard MCP server for CRM operations, task management, and sales analytics. Consolidated CRUD tools to reduce token usage.
author: Sixty Sales Dashboard

tools.name: manage_deals
tools.description: Manage deals: create, read, update, delete, search, or move between pipeline stages

tools.name: manage_contacts
tools.description: Manage contacts: create, read, update, delete, or search

tools.name: manage_companies
tools.description: Manage companies: create, read, update, delete, or search

tools.name: manage_activities
tools.description: Manage activities (calls, emails, meetings, proposals): create, read, update, delete, or search

tools.name: manage_tasks
tools.description: Manage tasks: create, read, update, delete, complete, or search

tools.name: manage_meetings
tools.description: Manage meetings: create, read, update, delete, or search

tools.name: manage_roadmap
tools.description: Manage roadmap items: create, read, update, delete, or search

tools.name: summarize_meetings
tools.description: Summarize meetings for a specific time period (week, month, etc.)

tools.name: find_coldest_deals
tools.description: Find deals that are the coldest (lowest engagement, oldest updates, etc.)

tools.name: find_at_risk_deals
tools.description: Find deals that are at risk based on risk level and health scores

tools.name: write_impactful_emails
tools.description: Generate high-impact emails for the week based on deal priorities and engagement

tools.name: get_performance_analytics
tools.description: Get comprehensive performance analytics for any time period (deals, revenue, activities, meetings, tasks)
